thread.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?

auth.title: Agent Chat
auth.welcome: Welcome to Agent Chat! Before you get started, you need to enter the URL of the deployment and the assistant / graph ID.
auth.deploymentUrlDesc: This is the URL of your LangGraph deployment. Can be a local, or production deployment.
auth.assistantIdDesc: This is the ID of the graph (can be the graph name), or assistant to fetch threads from, and invoke when actions are taken.
auth.apiKeyDesc: This is NOT required if using a local LangGraph server. This value is stored in your browser's local storage and is only used to authenticate requests sent to your LangGraph server.
auth.connectionFailed: Failed to connect to LangGraph server
auth.connectionFailedDesc: Please ensure your graph is running at {{url}} and your API key is correctly set (if connecting to a deployed graph).
